title: STK offers $30 lunch menu during Chicago Restaurant Week
statement: STK offers a $30 lunch prix-fixe menu during Chicago Restaurant Week featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak.

citations.quote: enjoy our exclusive prix-fixe menus, including a $30 Lunch featuring Tuna Tartare Tacos and Steakhouse Skirt Steak
